org.eclipse.incquery.patternlanguage.typing

Interface ITypeInferrer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTypeInferrer, EMFTypeInferrer, ITypeInferrer.NullTypeInferrer

    public interface ITypeInferrer
    The type inferrer calculates the types of variables and variable references of the pattern model.
    Author:
    Zoltan Ujhelyi

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ITypeInferrer.NullTypeInferrer
      An empty implementation of ITypeInferrer that can be used by the abstract pattern language module.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getDeclaredType(Variable var)
      Returns the declared type of a variable
      java.lang.Object getInferredVariableType(Variable var)
      Returns the inferred type of a variable
      org.eclipse.xtext.common.types.JvmTypeReference getVariableJvmType(Variable var, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject context)
      Creates a Jvm Type Reference for a selected variable.
      java.lang.Object getVariableReferenceType(VariableReference reference)
      Calculates the type of a variable reference.
      java.lang.Object getVariableType(Variable var)
      Returns the type of a variable.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeclaredType

        java.lang.Object getDeclaredType(Variable var)
        Returns the declared type of a variable
        Parameters:
        var -
        Returns:
        the declared type of the variable, or null if no type declaration is available

      • getInferredVariableType

        java.lang.Object getInferredVariableType(Variable var)
        Returns the inferred type of a variable
        Parameters:
        var -

      • getVariableType

        java.lang.Object getVariableType(Variable var)
        Returns the type of a variable.
        Parameters:
        var -
        Returns:
        if the variable has a declared type, it is returned; otherwise the inferred type is calculated.

      • getVariableReferenceType

        java.lang.Object getVariableReferenceType(VariableReference reference)
        Calculates the type of a variable reference. A type of a reference is the type of the referred variable.
        Parameters:
        reference -

      • getVariableJvmType

        org.eclipse.xtext.common.types.JvmTypeReference getVariableJvmType(Variable var,
                                                                   org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject context)
        Creates a Jvm Type Reference for a selected variable. Useful during Jvm Model Inference
        Parameters:
        var -
        context -
